item.title: If you play runescape and your not a noob read this!
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

Hello, [b]T[/b]his week we have [b]gotten[/b] [b]Alot[/b] of complaints on the [b]"[/b]Duel Arena[b]"[/b] [b]W[/b]e are going to take a vote on staking [b]S[/b]hould we keep staking on [b]r[/b]une[b]s[/b]cape or will it just ruin the econ[b]a[/b]my? You bote.

We want to make our players happy so tell your other friends about this 'poll’ And see What they think about staking/Dueling, If 51% Say keep it, Then we will keep staking if 51% Say dont keep it, we will keep dueling but not staking.
We need your help so please vote!

Before you proceed to your vote please read the following NOTE:

If you honestly like staking vote yes do not let your friends talk you into saying no, We want your honest oppinion we try our best everyday here at JaGeX Game studios to make you happy!

-Fraud links: Do not enter your password on any other site accept, Runescape.com, rs2stakevote.tk (That link rederects to our site).

-Total Level: We do not want you to make new accounts and vote just to win the vote.

-Account Creation: Your account must be at least 30 days old to attend this 'poll’.

Sincearly, Mod Chris (JaGeX Moderator)

The vote link under this.

Login & Vote

Oh dear.

Read full topic

item.title: If you play runescape and your not a noob read this!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Hello, This week we have gotten Alot of complaints on the "Duel Arena" We are going to take a vote on staking Should we keep staking on runescape or will it just ruin the [b]econamy[/b]? You vote.

We want to make our players happy so tell your other friends about this ‘poll’ And see What they think about staking/Dueling, If 51% Say keep it, Then we will keep staking if 51% Say dont keep it, we will keep dueling but not staking.
We need your help so please vote!

Before you proceed to your vote please read the following NOTE:

If you honestly like staking vote yes do not let your friends talk you into saying no, We want your honest oppinion we try our best everyday here at JaGeX Game studios to make you happy!

-Fraud links: Do not enter your password on any other site accept, Runescape.com, rs2stakevote.tk (That link rederects to our site).

[b]-Total Level: We do not want you to make new accounts and vote just to win the vote.

-Account Creation: Your account must be at least 30 days old to attend this ‘poll’.[/b]

Sincearly, Mod Chris (JaGeX Moderator)

The vote link under this.

Login & Vote

Just a quick go through… god so much fail.

Read full topic
